name: artist_albums
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool spotify_data.
Tool description: Spotify Data
API description: Fetches the albums of an artist from the Spotify API using RapidAPI.

is_id.description: The unique identifier for the artist.

offset.description: The index of the first album to return. Defaults to 0.

limit.description: The maximum number of albums to return. Defaults to 100.
